summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER:  16V340000 (AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT SPOKE WITH NALLEY LEXUS SMYRNA (2750 COBB PKWY SE, SMYRNA, GA 30080) WHO STATED THAT THE PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE IN SEPTEMBER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
